sentence.Network_en: Finally, the coagulum is dried to remove residual volatiles.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后, 凝结物风干后去除残留挥发物.

sentence.Network_en: During coagulation, milk changes its state from liquid to semisolid known as gel or coagulum.
